text: Ebam tini pita-matake sinhasanera upara basalena ebam tara saba'i tamra samane sejadabanata hala. Tini balalenah pita e hacche amara itipurbekara sbapnera barnana amara palanakarta eke satye parinata karechena ebam tini amara prati anugraha karechena. Amake jela theke bera karechena ebam apanaderake grama theke niye esechena, sayatana amara o amara bha'idera madhye kalaha srsti kare deyara para. Amara palanakarta ya cana, kausale sampanna karena. Niscaya tini bijna, prajnamaya.
